summary: A spin-off of the Get Smart movie, centered on Bruce, a techie at CONTROL, and his nerdy analyst cohort, Lloyd.
cast: Masi Oka|Nate Torrence|Jayma Mays|Marika Dominczyk|J.P. Manoux|Larry Miller|Bryan Callen|Mitch Rouse|Kelly Karbacz|Patrick Warburton|Ruben Garfias|Terry Rhoads|Sunkrish Bala|Erica Zodtner|Winston J. Rocha|Brianna Rain King|Matt Kaminsky|Al Coronel|Luisa Moraes|Amanda Tosch|Terry Crews|Brian Gattas|Ernie Grunwald|Regan Burns|Vincent M. Ward|Philip Centanni|Tony Collins|Anne Hathaway|Angeline Herron|Alexandra Hulme|Robin Timpanaro Lagrassa|Caroline Pho|George F. Watson|Poco Zocko
title: Superagente 86 - Bruce y Lloyd descontrolados
